metadata.title: CVE-2021-30682 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions. This issue is fixedin tvOS 14.6, iOS 14.6 and iPadOS 14.6, Safari 14.1.1, macOS Big Sur 11.4,watchOS 7.5. A malicious application may be able to leak sensitive userinformation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30682` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.0-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.0-1ubuntu3').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
